items.summary: Update the Admin Panel page authentication logic in frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelPage.tsx to use the admin credentials: username 'admin' and password 'habibur123' (replacing the current default credentials 'admin'/'admin123').

Ensure the admin credentials are stored securely in the frontend code without plain-text exposure in console logs or client-side debugging tools, using basic client-side credential verification suitable for a simple admin access control system.

Test the updated admin authentication flow by verifying that an admin can successfully log in to /admin-panel using username 'admin' and password 'habibur123', view the list of registered users, and approve pending users without errors.
